urls.title: Global Banking Summit
urls.description: Global banking is undergoing a radical transformation. The pandemic, competitive pressures, evolving customer expectations, disruptive technologies, shifting regulation and the growing influence of ESG are just some of the issues forcing institutions across the world to rethink and reorganise how they do business. Complacency is not an option in an environment where agility and resilience are the keys to differentiation, profitability and growth. The challenges faced by bankers globally are significant but so too are the opportunities. As the world continues to grapple with Covid-19 what else keeps the industry’s leaders awake at night? From region to region, what are their top priorities, and what kind of recovery do they expect and seek? Are central banks doing enough to support the sector, particularly given the looming threat of debt and default, and the fragility of the global economy? To what extent will approaches to lending and risk change as recovery steps up? What is the outl
